text: Luiz dos Santos (born 5 April 1952) is a Brazilian rower. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Brazil Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo
title: Luiz dos Santos
